image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to generate video from (image-to-video). Supports jpg, jpeg, png, webp.

video.title: Video
video.description: Input video to edit (video editing mode). Must be a direct link, max 8.7 seconds. Supports mp4, mov, webm.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds (1-15). Ignored when editing a video.

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Resolution of the video. Ignored when editing a video.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Ignored when editing a video or when providing an input image.
